field
The function allows getting the value of the data source field.
Syntax
field
(field)
Setting
Purpose
field
Source field.
Note
The function is used in the data source algorithm (object of the “Algorithm. Data sources” type).
The function can be called after selecting a data source.
The function is called from the “Sources” section of the toolbar of the algorithm editor. As a result, a modal window will be opened to select the source field the value of which should be received.
Use example
For example, when setting the text style in
“Key Indicators” dashboard
,
formatting style
should be set depending on the value of the “Status” source field. The algorithm may look as follows:
To do this, when creating the algorithm, the required source is selected in the “Data source” field, and then the “Status” field is selected in the modal window when calling the
field
function.
